subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James made headlines with his decision to join the Heat, but his move was possible only because another All-Star, Miami’s Dwyane Wade, agreed to cede some space in the spotlight.
snippet: LeBron James made headlines with his decision to join the Heat, but his move was possible only because another All-Star, Miami’s Dwyane Wade, agreed to cede some space in the spotlight.
